DataElement.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity Target Anatomic Site Laterality Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed action of applying, dispensing or otherwise giving medications or other substances to experimental units. EXAMPLE(S): An experimental unit who receives methotrexate as part of chemotherapy, radiation therapy. For a SubstanceAdministration, targetAnatomicSiteCode = "coronary artery", approachAnatomicSiteCode = "groin", routeOfAdministrationCode = "intra-arterial". A coded value specifying the side of the body (or a paired organ) that is a target site for a procedure. EXAMPLE(S): bilateral, left, right

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity Target Anatomic Site Laterality Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A material with particular features.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.:Named locations of or within the body.:Dominant use or manifestations of one side of the body versus the other; referring to a side of the body or of a structure.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Substance Administration Intervention or Procedure Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A material with particular features.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.:Named locations of or within the body.:Dominant use or manifestations of one side of the body versus the other; referring to a side of the body or of a structure.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.
Named locations of or within the body.
Dominant use or manifestations of one side of the body versus the other; referring to a side of the body or of a structure.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
